Title: Charles-Hubert Paris Gold-Plated Satin Finish Mechanical Pocket Watch
Description: Charles-Hubert, Paris Gold-Plated Satin Finish Mechanical Pocket Watch Features: 14k gold-plated satin brass 50mm hunter case with a matching curb chainSkeleton dial with roman numerals17 jewel mechanical movementDeluxe gift box Product Details: Product Dimensions: 4.9 x 4.4 x 1.4 inchesShipping Weight: 4.8 ouncesItem model number: 3789-GDomestic Shipping: Item can be shipped within U.S. International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S. Learn More Description Lustrous gold-tone accents and refined attention to detail highlight this classic pocket watch. It has a white-trim skeleton dial with Roman numerals, an interesting mix of precise mechanics and traditional elegance. A matching curb chain and deluxe gift box are also included. Matching curb chain. Skeleton dial. Roman numerals. 17 jewel mechanical movement. Comes with deluxe gift box. 14k gold plated. Satin finish. 1.96 in. Dia. Designed for the sophisticated gentleman, the Charles-Hubert, Paris Gold-Plated Satin Finish Mechanical Pocket Watch 3789-G has a traditional, luxurious style. Perfect for engraving, a 14K gold-plated satin finish cover opens to reveal a skeleton dial with black-tone Roman numeral hour markers and three hands. Seventeen- jewel mechanical movement adds both retro appeal and ensures accuracy, while a scratch-resistant crystal guards against wear and tear. At once classic and contemporary, this Charles-Hubert original arrives in a deluxe blue giftbox with gold-tone curb chain.
